name: SpaceJump (itch)
description:
You are a space dweller in cosmos. Recently you ran out of Starbucks(Space money) trying to rebuild your spaceship to return back to Earth. Fortunately for you a town on Kepler-24 is having a jumping competition, the winner is rewarded with 100 thousand Starbucks. With that money, you could easily rebuild your ship and voyage back home. You decide to participate in the competition, will you win the money? 

This game was originally built for android, sadly Unity would not let me build it properly, so I could only upload the PC version. :(

Creator: Laura Priskus
